mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PAGEVIEW_LOG (mdn, conn_ip, measure_date, page_name, page_url, page_param, reserved1, reserved2, reserved3) VALUES ( #{mdn},#{conn_ip},(select MAX(a.measure_date)+1 from TB_PAGEVIEW_LOG a),#{page_name},#{page_url},#{page_param},#{reserved1},#{reserved2},#{reserved3})
INSERT INTO tb_sms_certify (idx, ctn, certinum, regdate, id) VALUES(tb_sms_certify_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ctn}, #{certinum}, SYSDATE, #{id})
mapper.select: select CERTINUM from (SELECT CERTINUM FROM TB_SMS_CERTIFY WHERE CTN=#{ctn} and id = 'OEM' ORDER BY IDX DESC) where rownum < 2
mapper.insert: insert into TB_EVENT_USER4 (REGDATE, MIN, NAME) values (#{regdate}, #{min}, #{name})
